metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5550 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In a shared hosting environment that has been misconfigured to allow accessto other users' content, a Moodle user who also has direct access to theweb server outside of the Moodle webroot could utilise a local file includeto achieve remote code execution.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
